short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Displays the most-used Twitch chat messages & emotes in Theatre Mode.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
When Twitch chat is moving so fast no one will know who's memeing, Twitch Hype analyzes the most recent messages to show you how the audience is reacting. Works on live streams and VOD playback in Theatre mode.

Toggle on and off on a per-channel basis by clicking the "H" icon in Chrome's toolbar.

To hide spoilers on Twitch VODs, also check out "Twitch VOD Unspoiler".

This extension is open source and values your privacy. It does not collect or transmit any data or analytics.
